TopicTitle: What are the best space station part mods

Articles.Content: I have seen a lot of cool screenshots of space stations in orbit and i have decided to make my own but i was wondering are there any good part packs i should try? and also are there any good docking mods too.
The best is Kosmos, but it's out of date and they seem to be struggling to get it updated and rereleased.
I really like Bace, Probodobodyne, and Kosmos' Panels and accessories myself.
I think Bace is my favorite Space station-ish mod.
I'm not familiar with Bace, and a forum search didn't dig up the right thread. Was it subsumed into another addon pack? Would you be so kind with a link? Thanks.
Try Pelf's ExPI pack, Crewtank and Deep Space Mission Pack
